overview: While attempting to seduce gorgeous lawyer Diane Lightson, wealthy gadabout Chris Thorne agrees to drive her to Atlantic City, N.J. But, when some reckless driving draws the attention of a deeply critical cop, they and the flamboyant "Brazillionaires" who tagged along end up in the court of a grotesque and vengeful judge, who has a special vendetta against the wealthy and erudite.
tagline: All they wanted was a little getaway. All they got was nothing but trouble.
cast: Chevy Chase|Dan Aykroyd|John Candy|Demi Moore|Daniel Baldwin
